name: Endling's Ashes
description:
A short puzzle platformer about a Corgi who faces discrimination on a journey to do honor to its loved one. Made for Global Game Jam 2019.

Controls:
WASD, Space to pick up items

Jam Site: 
HKU, University of the Arts Utrecht

Jam Year: 
2019

Platforms: 
MS Windows

Tools And Technologies: 
Unity (any product)

Technology Notes: 
Audio software: - Audacity - Studio One 3

Credits: 

Game Designer - Julius de Blaaij
Development - Casey Hofland
Art - Woomy Heus
Game and Narrative Designer - Ilya Janssen
Music and Sound Designer - Thijs Engel

Font by Cody Boisclair
